Brand: BOTANICARY

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Directions: Gently massage 3-4 drops onto the face, neck and d collet in upward strokes. Apply as the final step in your skincare routine to lock in hydration and skincare actives. Increase absorption and hydration by applying with our RE-ENERGIZE Jade Crystal Sculpting Roller.
